named-query.name: WorkflowProcessNodeLog.readByProcessId
named-query.query: SELECT new ci.gouv.dgbf.system.workflow.server.persistence.entities.WorkflowProcessNodeLog( nodeLog.id,nodeLog.nodeId,nodeLog.nodeInstanceId,nodeLog.workItemId ) FROM NodeInstanceLog nodeLog WHERE nodeLog.processId = :processId

named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(taskLog) FROM NodeInstanceLog nodeLog WHERE nodeLog.processId = :processId
